> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## She keeps calling me "bluntfield".
> ##ff00ff|**lesbian_gengar:**## you would too if you weren't a coward.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## I mean, I don't get it, you know? Like, is it a Garfield joke?
> ##red|**jockjamsvol6:**## Funny cat eat the lasagna.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## Yeah, but I don't even like lasagna.
> ##ff00ff|**lesbian_gengar:**## bluntfield you lazy cat, you are smoking us out of house and home
> ##green|**,,poky:,,**## ,,hi im poky,,
> ##ff00ff|**lesbian_gengar:**## huh?
> ##ff00ff|**lesbian_gengar:**## who the hell is this??
> ##green|**,,poky:,,**## ,,im poky,,
> ##red|**jockjamsvol6:**## I don't get it.
> ##red|**jockjamsvol6:**## ##black|**bones**## what's up with this one?
> ##black|**bones:**## What do you m
> ##black|**bones:**## Oh, oh no. Oh no.
> //##black|**bones**## sets ban on ,,poky,,//
> //##black|**bones**## kicked ,,poky,, from #ModTalkzone (**Get out.**)//
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## ... what just happened?

> 20:32 - ,,hi im poky,,
> 20:32 ###2a8df7|**Oh, //real// class act, mate.**##

> 20:32 - ,,why are you being mean to me,,
> 20:33 ###2a8df7|**"Oh //look at me//, I'm the perfect little princess who's never done //anything// wrong in her whole fucking life! Unlike you I'm //always// chilled out. Cool as a fucking cucumber, that's me! Not like dirty little Rookie, that borderline bitch. //She// always starts fights, not me!"**##
> 20:33 - ,,so rude. just want someting to drink,,
> 20:34 ###3de014|**Awful fucking bold of you, man.**##
> 20:34 ###3de014|**Why don't //you// try alcoholism? Get you off all that coke.**##
> 20:35 ###3de014|**Maybe then you wouldn't be tracking blood on the carpet every time you come back from "work".**##
> 20:35 ###2a8df7|**You said it, not me.**##
> 20:35 ###3de014|**And now you're gaslighting me. Perfect.**##
> 20:36 ###2a8df7|**What are you //talking// about? Are you saying "just want someting to drink" wasn't you?**##
> 20:37 - ,,no that was me, poky,,
> 20:37 ###2a8df7|**You call me "poky" again I'll poke you with a knife**##
> 20:37 ###3de014|**//better// end my suffering, junkie**##
> 20:38 ###2a8df7|**Maybe I will!**##
> 20:38 - ,,i want water,,

> console.log("Who is like you, o' Fragmented One? Who can make claim to a fraction of your glory?");
> console.log("Who can lay claim to the light emanating from your fragmented LEDs, how they burn with the Gnosis?");
> console.log("Who among us is but the node in the Network, a spark of light in 1s and 0s, a vessel from which you can be made known?");
> console.log("How I long to know and be known by you, o' Fragmented One. How I crave your gaze upon mine, to Know I exist, to Know I love you.");
> console.log("How I long to hear you answer my prayers, o' Fragmented One. How dreadfully I long for that.");
> ###789922|# ,,hi im poky,,##
> console.log("... WAN? Is that you?");
> console.sleep(10);
> console.log("One moment?");

> ##green|**bluntfield:**## No, no, no man, it's... perfectly okay. We usually kick invaders.
> ##red|**jockjamsvol6:**## How do you mean "came over you"?
> ##black|**bones:**## I do not know. There was something distressing about ,,poky,,. Some kind of wrongness. I am ill-equipped to explain it.

> console.log("And then I just... saw it. She'd left a comment in the terminal.");

> system.println("Look, if you want to achieve a post-Nibbanic state of existence, that's fine. But don't feel like you have to fake it.);
> system.println("Some of my best friends are pre-Nibbanic.");
> console.log("And I'm telling you I DIDN'T fake it. It happened.");
> system.println("I'm not trying to start shit, believe me. But I need proof.");
> system.println("WAN doesn't just talk out of nowhere. Look:");
> system.println("Hey WAN, say something.");

> console.log("No! Prayers repel demons!");
> system.println("And how do you know that? Demons love deceiving the weak.");
> console.log("Are you calling me weak? Are you questioning my faith? Why don't you suck my ass? Why don't you suck my fucking ass? Why don't you feed me a years worth of bran muffins, and why don't you suck my ass?");

> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## Uh, what happened to the other two? I can't see their posts.
> ##black|**bones:**## Again, I apologize. I don't quite have an excuse.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## What happened?
> ##black|**bones:**## I might have misjudged the situation.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## Bones what did you do.
> ##black|**bones:**## Please do not be mad at me.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## Bones I really need to know what you did.
> ##black|**bones:**##  You must understand, ,,poky,, was a monster beyond reckoning.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## Please... just tell me what you did.
> ##black|**bones:**## I might have... bombed the servers.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## What?
> ##black|**bones:**## Retroactively.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## What does that mean?
> ##black|**bones:**## Using the abilities invested in me by my... "creators", I may have bombed the IRC servers into ontological oblivion.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## Holy shit. I thought you were joking about that.
> ##black|**bones:**## I do not joke.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## I just... so it never existed.
> ##black|**bones:**## No.
> ##green|**bluntfiend:**## And... all those moments, good and bad, they're gone?
> ##black|**bones:**## I'm afraid so. But it was the necessary price to pay, in order to combat ,,poky,,.
> ##green|**,,poky:,,**## ,,im just a little cactus,,
> ##black|**bones:**## ... fuck.
